qos.name: QoS Level
qos.description: MQTT QoS level for message delivery
qos.description_zh: MQTT 消息传输使用的服务质量等级

format.name: Upload Format
format.description: JSON format of the data reported in the upload topic. In values mode, data are split into `values` and `errors` sub objects. In tags mode, tag data are put in a single array.
format.description_zh: 上报数据的 JSON 格式。在 format-values 格式下，数据被分为 `values` 和 `errors` 两个子对象。在 format-tags 格式下，数据被放在一个数组中。

cache-mem-size.name: Cache Memory Size (MB)
cache-mem-size.description: Max in-memory cache size in megabytes when MQTT connection exception occurs. Should be smaller than cache disk size.
cache-mem-size.description_zh: 当 MQTT 连接异常时，最大的内存缓存大小（单位：MB）。应该小于缓存磁盘大小。

cache-disk-size.name: Cache Disk Size (MB)
cache-disk-size.description: Max in-disk cache size in megabytes when MQTT connection exception occurs. Should be larger than cache memory size. If nonzero, cache memory size should also be nonzero.
cache-disk-size.description_zh: 当 MQTT 连接异常时，最大的磁盘缓存大小（单位：MB）。应该大于缓存内存大小。如果不为 0，缓存内存大小也应该不为 0。

ssl.name: SSL
ssl.description_zh: 是否启用 SSL 连接

ca.name: CA
ca.description: CA certificate which signs the server certificate
ca.description_zh: 签发服务器证书的 CA 证书

cert.name: Client Cert
cert.description: Client x509 certificate when using two way authentication
cert.description_zh: 使用双向认证时，客户端的 x509 证书

key.name: Client Private Key
key.description: Client private key when using two way authentication
key.description_zh: 使用双向认证时，客户端的私钥

keypass.name: Client Private Key Password
keypass.description: Client private key password when using two way authentication with an encrypted client private key
keypass.description_zh: 使用加密的客户端私钥进行双向认证时，客户端私钥的密码
